"was denken sie über die datenprivatsphäre? ich finde es total unangemessen, dass unternehmen unsere persönlichen informationen sammeln und verwenden können, ohne unsere zustimmung einzholen zu müssen. #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "what do you think about data privacy? i find it totally inappropriate that companies can collect and use our personal information without obtaining our consent. #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it expresses the concern that companies are able to collect and use personal information without obtaining consent from individuals, and questions the ethics of this practice. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
